game.name: Train Simulator: Amtrak P42DC 50th Anniversary Collector’s Edition
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The year 2021 marked Amtrak’s 50th Anniversary in serving as America’s national intercity passenger railroad – and now, a beautiful selection of Amtrak’s special livery diesels comes to Train Simulator!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The year 2021 marked Amtrak’s 50th Anniversary in serving as America’s national intercity passenger railroad – and now, a beautiful selection of Amtrak’s special livery diesels comes to Train Simulator!
